cleaned_reviews: mrt taman pertama review mrt taman pertama part of the klang valleys mass rapid transit mrt system
appreciate and very thankful for the malay women staff my wallet was missing and she help me keep at station thank you so much

im a regular mrt commuter and generally enjoy the convenience and comfort of the rides however todays customer service experience at the ticket counter left me disappointed i had approached the counter to purchase a one day unlimited
spacious mrt station peak hour have to wait few round to get into the train

it was okay got vending machines and the floor is clean this place is usually not a good place to pick up grab as the road is always jammed to the point its hard to go out to the main road on weekdays the popbox here is sometimes hard
overall service should improve staff also look like they are dying at work if you entered the station and need to topup staff will ask you to exit again
calm and clean metro station few ticket vending machine doesnt work ticket vendors at the counter are kind and helpful
during peak hours towards the city you wont get space to get into the train so much crowded if you are planning to go to office and rely on this station think twice
easy excess to mini market shops like speed mart and kk mart
staff super rude and not friendly not helpful at all cant event talk in a proper attitude like i owed them money üßê
a mrt connected to a mall and with a nice view sad that the air conditioner at the bridge to mall doesnt work
near to housing area and shoplot clean and easy to access jem sometimes
mrt stopped at station taman pertama more than mins without reasons kinda dumb
this station allows efficient and effective transport to taman pertama

unfriendly staff at the counter busy on the smartphone rather than dealing with customers
great place to park and eat simple food
clean easy access to taman tenaga
nearest station to taman pertama and kfc
